desc: At Opinno, we help large corporations to transform through innovative methodologies used by start-ups and entrepreneurs. We see innovation as a process that begins by listening to people and ends with the design and prototyping of new products and services that generate an impact on society, this being said the foundation of our model is: people, ideas and solutions. We are editors for MIT Technology Review and Harvard Business Review in Spanish.In our Academy program, we transform the skills of our students by teaching and helping them to develop highly demanded digital and technological skills. Our aim is twofold. First, we increase companies’ competitiveness by improving the digital hard skills of their employees. Second, we increase the employability of both undergraduate and graduate students by developing the hard and soft skills they will need to lead the process of digital transformation in companies. We focus on developing hard skills by using learning-by-doing, problem solving and corporate challenges as learning methodologies.We are looking for someone for our upcoming project with availability from 3/11/2017 to 22/12/2017 who has the following skills and can handle the following responsibilities:Requirements:We appreciate experience in team leading, customer management and project management software. Ability to collaborate and coordinate using online tools is of interest as well. Communication skills are very important for teaching. However some skills in any of the following are needed: UX (2 years or more of experience): both methodologies (ie. HCI) and tools (ie. InVision or Sketch),Digital Marketing (2 years or more of experience): SEO, SEM or Social Networks or Emergent Technologies (ie. Blockchain, Big Data, Machine Learning, Chatbots, etc.). Some skills or minimal experience is OK. Some designing skills are needed. Availability to travel in Spain. A good level of English is not needed but a nice plus.Responsibilities:Planning and coordinate projects execution: executed accordingly, controlling for time, team and budget. Communication and coordination with customer and third parties Design learning methods and developing content for training sessions. Teach in Digital marketing or UX.
title: UX or Digital Marketing Trainer

desc: Our company focuses on Healthcare Education. We produce specialty specific seminars that are presented yearly from Jan thru May to a live audience.  Additionally, we pre-record seminars, which require editing and selling them on our website.  We are in the pre-launch phase and are in need of someone to help us project manage the entire process. Please see a high-level overview of the steps below.The authors will create a powerpoint presentation and narrate it using Camtasia Recroder. The goal is to produce this recording and take it to market.I'm looking for an extremely versatile & savvy PM that has a significant amount of experience with outsourcing tasks and finding superior talent regardless of the project.The ideal candidate is a sharp go-getter that can learn and adapt quickly. Someone that just gets things done the right way the first time, doesn't make excuses, and knows how to overcome challenges through persistence.- Work with the authors of these seminars to ensure the product is completed on time- Find and manage freelancers to:*  Edit the recorded seminars*  Ceate a Marketing Plan for both the live seminars and pre-recorded seminars.*  To execute the Marketing plan and email campaign*  Modify our Website with the above marketing material*  Create a mechanism to signup for Live Webinars and/or purchase pre-recordedseminars, including a shopping cart integration and a plugin to distribute purchasedpre-recorded seminars.Skills or Qualities-  Ability to work with fast-paced individuals.-  Being responsive, via text or brief call is a must.-  A background in digital marketing is an advantage, but not a must.-  GREAT Communicator-  HIGHLY Motivated-  Takes Their Work Seriously Always-  Is super detail-oriented. You are the kind of person that notices when there’s an extraspace between two words. And you can’t relax until it’s fixed-  Keeps attention to detail at the forefront including perfect grammar in emailcommunication, clear and concise, and free of spelling errors.-  Has a ‘flair’ for friendly yet professional writing style.-  Is always organized. If you have a perfectly tidy desk at all times, this is the role for you.-  Be proactive-  Take initiative-  Problem solve-  Be friendly-  Meet deadlines*** This project needs to be completed November the 30th ***ThanksLanny
